questions.text: Score up to 3 areas of interest.
questions.text_partner: Areas in which you/your organization can provide assistance. Score up to 3 selections.
choices: Criminal Justice, Public Safety, and Security

questions.text: Score up to 3 types of professional assistance you seek.
Score up to 2 program duration you  are interested in.
questions.text_partner: Program load you/your organization can provide? Score up to 2 selections.

questions.text: My current basic skills are in-Score up to 5
questions.text_partner: Preferred Participant Current Basic Skills-Score up to 5
choices: Helping people (to aid or assist someone)

questions.text: What is your employment status (Select up to 3).
questions.text_partner: Preferred employment status of the Participant: Score up to 3 selections

questions.text: I identify myself as: Select one.
questions.text_partner: Preferred Gender of the Participant - Score up to 3 selections
Preferred Marital Status of the Participant-Score up to 3 top selections

questions.text: I identify myself as: Select up to three
questions.text_partner: Preferred Ethnicity of the Participant-Score up to 3 top selections

questions.text: Highest degree or level of Education you have completed? If currently enrolled, highest degree received. Select One.
questions.text_partner: Preferred Education Level of the Participant-Score up to 3 to selections you/your organization serve.
Preferred Age Group of the Participant-Score up to 3 top selections.

questions.text: Current work experience level in the field of interest.
questions.text_partner: Preferred Work Experience of the Participant- Score up to 3 top selections.

questions.text: Which of the following life-events have you experienced? You can score up to 3 - score based on the perceived magnitude of impact
questions.text_partner: Can help Participants with following life experience-Score up to 3 top selections
choices: Foster care or Adoption agency-Loss of immediate family member at an early age

questions.text: Which of the personality type below do you consider yourself to be aligned with-One Selection
questions.text_partner: Preferred Personality Type of the Participant-Score up to 4 top selections.

questions.text: Which of the personality mindset below do you consider yourself to be aligned with.  Score up to 3
questions.text_partner: Preferred Mindset of the Participant- Score up to 3 selections

questions.text: I value Roles with work activities that are: score up to 3
questions.text_partner: You/your organization's work activities- Score up to 3  selections that best describes the activities exercised by you/your organization

questions.text: Values that you like to see where you work: Score up to 3
questions.text_partner: You/your organization's values- Score up to 3 selections that best reflect you/your organization's values

questions.text: The type of work environment you want to work in: score up to 3
questions.text_partner: You/your organizational working environment- Score up to 3 selections that best reflet you/your organization's environment

questions.text: The kind of team culture that you like to see where you work: score top 3
questions.text_partner: You/your organizational team culture- Score up to 3 selections that best reflect you/your organization team culture

sections.name: Assistance Category
sections.description_partner: Following questions are about specific aspects of assistance you can be most effective in providing and matching them with the Participants who can benefit the most.
sections.description_participant: Following questions are about specific aspects of assistance most helpful to you and matching them with the Partner(s) who can best help through your journey.

sections.name: Demographics
sections.description_participant: Following questions are NOT program qualifiers.  The responses are used to effect best and highest match between you and a partner that can best help you.
sections.description_partner: Following questions are NOT qualifing parameters for Participants.  The responses are used to effect best and highest match between you and the Participant(s) you feel you can best help.

sections.name: Behavioral Assessment
sections.description_participant: The following questions are an extension of the behavioral/personality Assessments you took and are used to match you with the Partners who are best suited to help you.  Your responses should be aligned with the Assessment results.
sections.description_partner: The following questions are an extension of the Participants' behavioral/personality attributes Assessments and are used to effect matches based on your preferences and the attributes needed for the targeted professional roles.
